## What are the principles?
For simplicity (or lack of better categorization) let's follow the [OSF](https://osf.io/tvyxz/wiki/2.%20Awarding%20Badges/) open science categories: Open Data, Open Materials, Open Code, and Open Access. I added the last one, OSF doesn't cover this in the linked site.
